;This is solid and needed based on the working implementation with 90 Road bend and OWR stub

0x51050000,1,0,0x5F943200,1,0=0x51050000,1,0,0x5F945400,1,0
0x51050000,3,0,0x5F943200,1,0=0x51050000,3,0,0x5F945400,1,0

;

;NWM-End T from TLA-3 Side
0x51050000,1,0,0x5F943300,2,0=0x51050000,1,0,0x5F946400,2,0

;RD-4

;RD-6

;TLA-7/AVE-6

;Other OWRs Handled In Separate Section

;OWR-3 Entry
;To OWR 4-Way +
;First OWR-3 Entry (OWR-3 x OWR-2)
;0x51040000,1,0,0x5F941200,1,0=0x51040000,1,0,0x5134A200,1,0
;0x51040000,3,0,0x5F941200,1,0=0x51040000,3,0,0x5134A200,1,0

;Second OWR-3 Entry (OWR-3 x OWR-3)

;To 2-OWR 2-Road +
;0x51040000,1,0,0x5F941100,1,0=0x51040000,1,0,0x5134A100,1,0
;0x51040000,3,0,0x5F941100,1,0=0x51040000,3,0,0x5134A100,1,0

;0x5134B100,1,0,0x09000300,3,0=0x5134B100,1,0,0x51040000,1,0

;To 1-OWR 2-Road T
;To 2-OWR 1-Road T
;To 1-OWR 3-Road T (One Road Converts to ARD-3/Type 110 TuLEP?)

;Road x Avenue auto slip lane 1 corner ortho
;Durfsurn 12072015
;need to change to keep the diagonal road T from converting
